hero.name: LAMARI KARIM
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating modern and high-performance web experiences. I turn ideas into elegant and functional web applications.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: At 26, I made a bold career change, leaving the hospitality industry to pursue my true passion: web development and programming.
about.paragraph2: Currently enrolled in the Full Stack Web Developer program at OpenClassrooms, I focus on creating modern, high-performance, and user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript.
about.paragraph3: My experience in hospitality taught me the value of attention to detail, working under pressure, and delivering exceptional experiences — skills I now apply to development.

bimisushi.title: BIMI SUSHI
bimisushi.description: A sushi restaurant website with online ordering and admin dashboard.
bimisushi.context: BIMI SUSHI is a sushi restaurant website that allows customers to browse the menu, place online orders, and manage reservations. The admin dashboard enables staff to manage orders, reservations, and the menu in real time. This project was one of my first using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript before being rebuilt in React for better maintainability and performance.
objectives: Create an attractive and user-friendly interface for customers.
Develop an efficient and secure online ordering system.
Implement an admin dashboard to manage restaurant operations.
skills: Transitioned from a static website to a modern full-stack architecture.
Designed REST APIs and handled CRUD operations.
results: The website is now fast and responsive with a fully functional admin dashboard.
Customers can easily place orders, and staff can efficiently manage the restaurant.
perspectives: Add an online payment system and email notifications for orders to enhance the customer experience.

blink.title: Blink
blink.description: A platform for creating invoices for freelancers and small businesses.
blink.context: Blink is a platform designed for freelancers and small businesses to quickly generate, organize, and send invoices professionally and intuitively.
objectives: Provide a simple interface to generate customized invoices.
Ensure a smooth user experience using Next.js performance features.
skills: Full-stack development with Next.js and MongoDB.
API management via App Router routes.
Created modern UI components with Tailwind CSS.
SEO optimization, performance, and data persistence.
results: Users can now create and manage invoices easily and efficiently with an intuitive interface.
perspectives: Add customizable invoice templates and automation for sending invoices via email.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: A real estate rental platform offering a smooth and intuitive user experience.
kasa.context: Kasa is a real estate rental platform developed as part of my OpenClassrooms training.
objectives: Design a modern interface faithful to the provided mockup.
Implement full routing with React Router.
Ensure a responsive experience across all devices.
skills: Structured a React application and created reusable components.
Implemented conditional rendering and faithfully integrated the UI mockup.
results: The platform now provides smooth navigation, a responsive design, and a UI faithful to the mockup.
perspectives: Add advanced search and filtering for properties to improve user navigation.

le-vieux-grimoire.title: Le Vieux Grimoire
le-vieux-grimoire.description: A website for a bookstore specializing in rare and antique books.
le-vieux-grimoire.context: Le Vieux Grimoire is an application developed as part of my OpenClassrooms training to create a complete backend.
objectives: Develop a complete and secure REST API.
Enable book addition, rating, and management.
skills: Created a full Node.js/Express backend using MVC architecture.
Handled authentication and security with JWT.
Managed MongoDB database with validation and error handling.
results: The website now has a secure backend for effective book and user management.
perspectives: Add stock management and an advanced admin interface for easier daily operations.

approach.title: My
approach.method: I like working in a structured yet flexible way. I combine an Agile approach to iterate quickly and test ideas, and I don't hesitate to collaborate or draw inspiration from design to improve the user experience.
approach.value: Curious and meticulous, I always seek to understand the 'why' before coding. My hospitality experience taught me patience, precision, and the importance of quality experiences — qualities I now apply in my web projects.
approach.vision: I believe clean code and a pleasant interface go hand in hand. My goal is to create high-performance, intuitive, and elegant web applications while keeping a pragmatic and user-centered approach.
